projects.name: FIZZI. Soda for gutsy people.
projects.summary: Created to learn about Prismic and React Three Fiber, it's a good way to drink knowledge.

projects.name: Radio Sunset Fm.
projects.summary: RadioSunset is a fully functional project created with the purpose of listening to country music-oriented radio stations, built with gsap, nextjs, and scss.

projects.name: APE COIN - A Different Stake.
projects.summary: Ape coin is a project focused mainly focused on frontend, created with different hooks like parallax and a carousel made only with javaScript.

projects.name: SNK - Wiki fandom
projects.summary: SNK is a full stack project, created to practice the use of apollo GQL in the backend and Nextjs in the frontend.

projects.name: Droned: Your drone store.
projects.summary: Droned is a beautiful store, created by using and practicing animations and loaders.
